attributes.action: Give The Stig from BBC Top Gear the opportunity to light the flame at the 2012 London Olympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Stig has become a household name in the UK and is also internationally recognised after featuring regularly on BBC's Top Gear.

We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to consider letting The Stig light the Olympic flame, or at the very least, pass on this suggestion to the Olympic commitee for serious consideration.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
